code: import React,{useState,useEffect}from'react';import Navbar from'./components/Navbar';import ProductList from'./components/ProductList';import CartModal from'./components/CartModal';import'./App.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function App(){const[cart,setCart]=useState([]);const[isModalOpen,setIsModalOpen]=useState(false);const addToCart=product=>{const exists=cart.find(item=>item.id===product.id);if(exists){alert('Item already added to the cart');}else{setCart([...cart,product]);}};const removeFromCart=id=>{setCart(cart.filter(item=>item.id!==id));};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"App",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Navbar,{cartCount:cart.length,onCartClick:()=>setIsModalOpen(true)}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ProductList,{addToCart:addToCart}),isModalOpen&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(CartModal,{cart:cart,onClose:()=>setIsModalOpen(false),removeFromCart:removeFromCart})]});}export default App;
